title: 40: Chipotle's Surprising Comeback
description:
Host Alex Eule is joined by Barron's senior writer David Marino-Nachison to talk about how Chipotle turned around its business after the stock crashed four years ago. The Readback is a weekly finance and business podcast from Barron's. Producer: Mette Lützhøft.
